# Deploy SC with Web3js and html js file.
## Example:
Launch a simple http server:
```bash
python3 -m http.server
(or python -m SimpleHTTPServer)
```

Get abi:
```bash
var abi = [
	{
		"inputs": [],
		"name": "count",
		"outputs": [
			{
				"internalType": "uint256",
				"name": "",
				"type": "uint256"
			}
		],
		"stateMutability": "view",
		"type": "function"
	},
	{
		"inputs": [],
		"name": "increment",
		"outputs": [
			{
				"internalType": "uint256",
				"name": "",
				"type": "uint256"
			}
		],
		"stateMutability": "nonpayable",
		"type": "function"
	}
]
```

Get bytecode:
```bash
var bytecode = ''
```

Deploy SC:
```bash
await deploy(abi,bytecode)
```
